title: Jimi Hendrix - Complete Berkeley 1970 (1st & 2nd Show) 3CD
description:
Jimi Hendrix

Complete Berkeley 1970

(Complete 1st Show, Complete 2nd Show & Rehearsal)

2012


  3CDs / 2012 / Remastered / 320Kbps
(Soundboard & Audience Source Combined) 


Disc 1 / 1st Show:

01. Intro / Bill Graham (In a Bad Mood) Rap

02. X Y (In a Bad Mood) Rap

03. Audience and Drums Tune-Up

04. Tune-Up and Jimi Intro

05. Fire

06. Johnny B. Goode

07. Hear My Train A-Comin'

08. Foxy Lady

09. Machine Gun

10. Freedom

11. Red House

12. Message To Love

13. Ezy Ryder


Disc 2 / 1st Show & Afternoon Rehearsal:

01. Star Spangled Banner

02. Purple Haze

03. Voodoo Child (Slight Return)

04. Message to Love*

05. Blue Suede Shoes*

06. Hey Baby (Land Of The New Rising Sun)*

07. Earth Blues*

08. Room Full of Mirrors*

09. Villanova Junction Blues*

10. Keep On Groovin'*

11. Freedom*

12. Power of Soul*

13. Machine Gun*

14. Blue Suede Shoes*

[*Afternoon Rehearsal]


Disc 3 / 2nd Show:

01. Intro

02. Pass It On (Straight Ahead)

03. Hey Baby (New Rising Sun)

04. Lover Man

05. Stone Free

06. Hey Joe

07. I Don't Live Today

08. Machine Gun

09. Foxy Lady

10. Star Spangled Banner

11. Purple Haze

12. Voodoo Child (Slight Return)

13. Applause / Outro

Recorded Live at the Berkeley Community Theatre on May 30, 1970


The Jimi Hendrix Experience:

Jimi Hendrix: guitar, vocals

Billy Cox: bass

Mitch Mitchell: drums 


Jimi Hendrix / Complete Berkeley 1970
